LetsDiscussText:
Thanks for your interest in our service! We suggest to finalize the details either here in the Chat or by Phone.
Please tell us your preference. 
Walter - cleanr.ai
EmployeeContactInfos: We first Need some Information from You
EmployeeSharePageThanks: Thank You for entering your Information! You can now share this service to your past or present employers or one of your colleague who could be interested too as well as request recommendations. We pay out bonuses for each accepted offer and each rating of your past work increases your chances to get hired!
Employee2EmployeeShareDescription: By sharing cleanr.ai with other cleaning people, you will get a bonus whenever they refer a client that accepts our offer!
Employee2EmployeeShareDefaultText: Hey, I'm extremely satisfied by the cleanr.ai team and believe that you would like working for them too.
Employee2EmployeeShareDefaultSubject: I think this offer would be great for you!
Employee2EmployerShareDescription: By sharing cleanr.ai with your current or past employer you will let them have 2h work credited to their account and you will receive a bonus if they accept a new offer!
Employee2EmployerShareDefaultText: Hey, I think you might be interested by the cleanr.ai cleaning services. They run an offer at this moment that will give you 2h of free work if you sign their offer!
Employee2EmployerShareDefaultSubject: I think this cleaning offer would be great for you!
EmployeeAskRecommendationDescription: By getting a recommendation from your present or past employers you increase your chances to get hired!
EmployeeAskRecommendationDefaultText: Hey, I applied to cleanr.ai and am increasing my chances to get hired if you rate my cleaning work for you! Please follow the link and download their app!
EmployeeAskRecommendationDefaultSubject: I would need you to rate my work!
